name: Argo's quest
description:
Welcome to the newest Argo adventure. 

He was commanded to retrieve the the old ancient rune of the dragon tribe, but was that a good idea?

Follow Argo on this platformer adventure, with some metroidvania touches, with eight levels to complete, and with optional quests for doing faster than the developer, or collecting all the treasures on the levels. 

Maybe there is a reward for doing each task on all the levels!

Once you complete the game once, there's a speedrun mode where you can't restart the levels and you have to do all the adventure on one go (you can die without lossing in this mode, but can you make it without dying too?).

I hope that you enjoy this game proyect!
